com.bitpay.sdk.model.invoice

Class Buyer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bitpay.sdk.model.invoice.Buyer

  • public class Buyer
extends Object
    Allows merchant to pass buyer related information in the invoice object.
    See Also:
    REST API Invoices

        public String getEmail()
